ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] General
ygData.msgSnippet: No problem. We were all newbies once. Welcome to the world of EverQuest. and say goodbye to real life! Mwahahahahaha. Nothing wrong with asking questions. luv,
ygData.messageBody:
No problem. We were all newbies once. Welcome to the world of EverQuest. and
say goodbye to real life! Mwahahahahaha.
Nothing wrong with asking questions.
luv,
-Su

> I would also like to say that I know this game has been out for ages,
> but I have only been playing for a couple of weeks now. I am new to
> the online gaming world.
>
> I know that a lot of questions have been answered in the past, but
> who honestly has time to go back and read all of that stuff?
> Especially when we spend all of our free time on EQ! LOL.
>
> Please be patient with me.
>
> Thanks,
> Faroina
>
